page.title: 08LANGUAGE and HOBBIES
page.content:
{BRISSLE}- Most people in this area speak mild Bristolian,which means that they add an l to words,for example, America becomes Americal and a girls name Tanya,would become Tanyal e.g. { "Nigerial is a malarial arial" They also mis-pronounce some words like "think" is said "fink" and "our" is said "are". Bristol was called Brigstow until Bristolian accent changed it.
{HOBBIES}- Most children aged under 11 follow a hobby of some kind. The most popular ones are{football,swimming and{brownies.}Most children enjoy collecting things, postage stamps are the favourite. Many adults have followed their hobbies since they were children. The most popular hobby for male adults we found to be{fishing}or {playing darts}and{skittles.
